title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
**Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve!**

Experience the ultimate in single-serve coffee convenience with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker in sleek Black. This compact brewer is designed to fit seamlessly into your kitchen, providing a rich and full-bodied coffee experience every time.

**Key Features:**

- **Brew Sizes:** Choose from 3 convenient brew sizes: 6oz, 8oz, and 10oz.
- **Brew Time:** Enjoy a freshly brewed cup of coffee in under a minute.
- **Water Reservoir:** 36oz removable water reservoir for easy refills.
- **Smart Start:** Automatically turns on when a K-Cup pod is inserted.
- **Button Controls:** Simple and intuitive button controls for easy operation.
- **Energy Efficient:** Auto-off feature turns off the brewer after 2 hours of inactivity.
- **Removable Drip Tray:** Accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew.
- **Hot Water Dispense:** Quickly dispense hot water for tea, instant soups, or oatmeal.
- **Compact Design:** Sleek black design with a width of only 8 inches, perfect for small kitchens.

**Compatibility:**

- Compatible with K-Cup pods for a wide variety of coffee flavors.
- Compatible with My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately).

**What's Included:**

- Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker (Black)
- Removable 36oz water reservoir
- Removable drip tray

**Order Now:**

Get your Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today and start enjoying the perfect cup of coffee every time!
